Headline: Kimball- bound Brown & Linden-bound Purple Line Service Delayed at Armitage
ShortDescription: Kimball- bound Brown & Linden-bound Purple Line trains are standing at Armitage due to a door problem. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Kimball- bound Brown & Linden-bound Purple Line trains are standing at Armitage due to a door problem.

At this time, consider other alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
